list.description: Animation library ready to use on websites and applications.

list.title: bClass-components
list.description: Ready component library for website and application interface.

list.title: bClass-media-player
list.description: A library for HTML-based audio and video player, encompassing essential functions like play, pause, quality, subtitles, playback speed, and many other necessary features as required.

list.title: bClass-status-pages
list.description: Status pages library ready to use on websites and applications.

list.title: bClass-toolkit-compressor
list.description: A toolkit that optimizes and minified CSS and JavaScript code, as well as providing information about file sizes.

list.title: bClass-toolkit-color-generator
list.description: A toolkit for creating a color palette with 7 different algorithms, utilizing random or desired color.

list.title: bClass-snippets
list.description: Snippets for bClass libraries, all in one place. With this tool you can easily use bClass libraries.

list.title: Prayer Time
list.description: Never miss a prayer again with our intuitive prayer time application.

list.title: E-Portfolio
list.description: A listing project, where developers can list the portfolio.

list.title: Lang Learn
list.description: Our Innovative Language Learning application offers users a simple and easy learning experience. Thanks to our user -friendly interface, a language student of all levels can increase their language skills wherever they want at any time.

list.title: Regex Generator
list.description: This application is used to create regular expressions (Regex). Regular expressions are a powerful tool used to search, change or match text data according to certain patterns.

list.title: Password Generator
list.description: Password Generator is a user-friendly application designed to create strong and secure passwords. This application can be customized according to users' specific needs and can generate complex passwords of the desired length.

list.title: Example Personal
list.description: The Website is a Simple Sample Site That Includes Contact Information About Me.

list.title: Example Estate
list.description: The website is an example of a site where users can see real estate ads and find contact information.

list.title: SHORT
list.description: The URL Shortening Application is a tool that turns long web addresses into short and easy-to-share ones. This way, you can share the links you want with less characters on platforms such as social media, email or messaging.

list.title: EnotE
list.description: Note / todo application where you can keep a list of your notes and jobs, as well as assign dates and priority to them.

list.title: MedDown
list.description: You can download video and audio from youtube. In addition, the download feature from different sites can be added in this project in the future.

list.title: XOX-Tic-Tac-Toe
list.description: Tic-tac-toe, also known as noughts and crosses, is a classic paper-and-pencil game played on a grid of 3x3 squares. The game is played by two players, usually referred to as X and O, who take turns marking their respective symbols on the grid. port control application allows network administrators or system administrators to detect open ports in their network and close these ports when necessary.
